message: Can anyone suggest some good advertising spots that are either paid and or free for web hosting companies?
@MarkLaViolette http://line25.com/ Chris Spooner is a great guy!

huh, not sure your question came across, do you mean you want to copy some good banner ads? (eg for your own product?)

Can you rephrase your question.
What I want is suggestions on places to advertise my company.  Or for others to advertise their company as well.
Hate to burst your bubble but you're competing in a highly saturated market. Nonetheless, try out www.webhostingtalk.com.
if you are sports focusssed you can advertise your company on www.LiveFanChat.com
